name: Klean Kanteen TKWide Cafe Bottle 590ml
description: The classic Klean Kanteen wide-mouth bottle with an internally threaded cap for greater thermal performance. Stainless steel with a chip-resistant finish stands up to the rigours of daily life.Made of food-grade 18/8 stainless steel that doesn't impart any flavours and is easy to clean.Double-walled vacuum-insulated keeps drinks warm for up to 17 hours and cool for up to 58 hours.Klean Coat™ finish is resistant to chipping and daily wear and tear.Internally threaded TK Closure design.Sip-through Cafe Cap has a swivel loop for easy carrying.
